description: My apartment is very clean, comfortable and in an ideal location in Brooklyn. One block away from G, J/Z lines and about an 8-minute walk to the L. Lots of restaurants and bars around and a great grocery store, coffeeshop and wine shop just around the corner. Neighbors are friendly and quiet. I don't like a lot of clutter, so it's a relatively minimal place, perfect for the lone traveler or couple.
name: Charming apt in central location!
